GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.7
GSD.description:
drm/msm/devfreq: Fix OPP refcnt leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.7 by commit a4eb55901df1dce8c6944438bbdf57caf08911e2, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 9bc95570175a7fbca29d86d22c54bbf399f4ad5a. For more details please see the references link.
